entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 11.
